text: Sounds a lot like Xenoblade chronicles, love it!
author: Florian P

text: This is one of the few games I've seen that uses the card motif well. In games like Baten Kaitos and KH: Chain of Memories I think it hinders the gameplay. The battle system is really interesting too. I love how they show you exactly when each entity will be moving, it gets me to think about even the small battles instead of just pressing "attack" over and over.
author: Sayeth Di Puppeth

text: Yes! Thank you Supra! I LOVED this game. I was thinking of it earlier and could not, for the life of me remember the name of the game. I was so hoping you would upload a song from it! Thanks a million!
